    Introduction to VPNs

    What is a Virtual Private Network (VPN)?

    Think of it as a tunnel. It has a start point (usually your own computer) and an end point (usually a server).

  • Apr 6, 2021

    What is a VPN and what are the benefits?

    A Virtual Private Network (VPN) is a way of securely tunneling your data across the internet to a VPN server.

    VPNs are used by organisations and individuals for different reasons.

    Before using a VPN you should consider what benefits you get from using it…

  • Mar 17, 2021

    Why we do NOT sell user data

    Heads Up! SafeJAM Ltd operates MySafeInternet.

    Our business has NEVER involved selling user data or targeted advertising, and we are committed to providing strong privacy protections. It’s in our DNA.
